author: .paulharris
content: It's kind of an annoying api to implement because it's doing all of the computation then throwing the data away anyway, but if its useful we can look at adding it. it does have the up side of not having to potentially stream hundreds of mb of data, so i do like that aspect...

author: jgm
content:
Seems to have very limited use. Explorers will surely take the full data from the validators endpoint rather than just a count.

I'm not in favour of including it, unless there are some compelling reasons to do so.
